meanings.definition: To make something larger or more extensive than usual.
meanings.sent1: Let's supersize the cake by adding more layers.
meanings.sent2: She always likes to supersize her order at the drive-thru.
meanings.sent3: I tried to supersize my cat by feeding him extra treats, but he just got chubby.
meanings.sent4: His ambition was to supersize his business into a global empire.
meanings.sent5: The magician used his wand to supersize the rabbit, making it giant.

meanings.definition: An extra-large or extra-large portion of food or drink.
meanings.sent1: The supersize soda came with free refills.
meanings.sent2: He ordered a supersize burger with extra cheese.
meanings.sent3: The supersize popcorn at the movies was bigger than his head.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a supersize portion of joy in the room.
meanings.sent5: The supersize ice cream cone was a tower of deliciousness.
